result.title: Вопрос (возможно контр тест) по задаче A.Дабстеп
result.content: I've solved the problem, but I have a question... for example if we take "WWUBUB" we will erase "W WUB UB" and then our string will be like "WUB" and what then? It'l have to erase it too? (Sorry for my english if I have any mistake)
